dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: Agent [Name], the city of Chicago has given us 24 hours to crack this case.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: To aid you through this, I have sent Babemax as your personal assistant for this investigation. I’ve texted you his location.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: Work closely and let nothing deter you from unveiling the truth.

choices.response: Got it, Boss! With Babemax, I’ll look into every detail we come across. We’re on a tight schedule, but I’m ready to make a strategic plan to uncover the truth.
Understood, Boss. I’ll look beyond the obvious, connecting the dots of what’s unseen. 24 hours is tight, but we’ll do the best we can and pivot as new information comes to light.

dialogues.speaker: BOSSP
dialogues.text: That’s precisely what I like to hear. Now, get cracking!

choices.response: Why were you sleeping if you’re a robot...?
Cool, a sleeping robot! Nice to meet you Babemax.

dialogues.speaker: BABEMAX
dialogues.text: Haha although I’m mostly automated, I feel sensations like hunger and fatigue. Gotta get my beauty sleep, y’know?

interactive.speaker: BABEMAX
interactive.prompt: Anyways, which direction would you like to go with our investigation?

choices.response: Why were you sleeping if you’re a robot...?
